reviews.text: Not a spicy as a traditional oktoberfest. Pours a light orangeish color. Lightly spiced with mild hops. A very easy to drink oktoberfest

Pours a cloudy redish brown with a bubbly and airy head. Smell is very faint and light but of fruit. Taste is strong rye followed by sweet cherry and brown sugar. Taste is light and airy like the head very high carbonation level. A nice smooth whisky aftertaste

I simply love this beeri love everything in it it is refreshing tasteful and perfectly done Great taste perfect ingredients and flavor.light body, thin feel, lively, light sweetness, medium bitterness, golden, clear content. The best beer in Lebanon by far.
